title: Ping Spikes Recently
body: Has anyone else noticed some bad ping in league recently? Like it spikes up and stays there for like 5 minutes before going back down, then it goes back up again after a little bit.

replies.body:
I haven't noticed any issues. However, usually, these sorts of issues are directly impacted by routing problems or problematic local settings on your network. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps that will ensure your local settings are up to par.

Should you still experience latency issues after taking those steps, we can investigate further.

I've definitely noticed an issue.  First, when you initially moved the servers, everything was great.  Got solid 30 ping normally and at worst (on the other server i guess) I would occasionally get 45 ping.   Both completely playable, no problems.  After a month or so, that 30 ping vanished and now 43 is the absolute best I can get.  Whatever still good.

However this past week, I've had a solid 80-90 ping.  No amount of PC resets, modem resets, or router resets change this.  Literally _nothing_ has changed on my end.  Not even a PC software update.  Before this, I had a somewhat steady ping of 43-50ish for months.

WoW servers in Chicago = solid 32 ping.  Rarely, if ever, fluctuates.
Overwatch servers = solid 32 ping. Rarely, if ever fluctuates. I'm aware that it's not officially Chicago but Blizzard owns servers in Chicago and it's a central location so it's possible.
LoL in Chicago = 43-80ish ping.
Well at least on my end I know it's my ISP, everyone in my area is having trouble with them it seems.

Anyone Experience a large steady ping increase? I was hovering at 39-42 steady for months and as of mid last week i now have a steady 85-115. No router or internet changes nothing else is effected except For league. Any ideas?
The game is unplayable for me. 90 to 400 ping, constantly fluctuating. How do I proceed?
Nah my network settings are fine. Logged in tonight to see My ping spikes a lot. Would like an educated riot post instead of the normal "it's your computer network settings"
